meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bob Powell Russell Howes Lynn Hammerlund Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6295.

td.p: Bob Powell, a network administrator from Fort Walton Beach, Florida
Russell Howes, a graduate student of mathematics originally from Taylorsville, Utah
Lynn Hammerlund, a college librarian from Lake in the Hills, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,500)

tr.td: COMMON COLD
CHICKEN SOUP
CLEAN "X"
(Alex: Each correct response will contain that letter of the alphabet.)
AIRBORNE
NIGHT QUILL
VICKSBURG
